entry.title: Monday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
